Richard Ledgard (Antonio Banderas) is a plastic surgeon who, after the death of his wife in a car accident, is interested in creating a skin with which he could have saved her. Twelve years later, he manages to cultivate this skin in vitro, taking advantage of advances in science and across fields prohibited as of transgenesis with human beings. However, this will not be the only offense that the surgeon will make.
